text: To honor #breastcancerawareness month, @drcaplan's #firesidechat will focus on how #cannabis products interact with #breastcancer, what #research is being done around #cancer and #medicalcannabis treatment, and an open Q+A for attendees.🎗️ Learn more at https://t.co/AoIxai45B1 https://t.co/eti0JHtK7H
